fitness_verdict:
üè∞ BUNKER: Low complexity, high resilience. The ideal state.

Recommended Action: Maintain current practices. Consider if any resilience measures are redundant.

complexity_analysis.verdict: Complexity appears well-matched to task requirements. The codebase follows the principle that simplicity enables reliability.
recommendations: WARNING: 1824 lines per function point suggests over-engineering. Industry standard is ~50.

recommendations.message: Add try/catch blocks around I/O operations, network calls, and parsing logic.
Transient failures are common. Implement retry with exponential backoff for external service calls.
Protect against cascading failures by adding circuit breakers to external dependencies.
Consider thread pool isolation and connection pool limits to prevent resource exhaustion.
